item.title: East Palestine reaches settlement with Norfolk Southern over 2023 derailment
item.description: The settlement agreement has "resolved all claims by the Village."

item.title: WATCH: Colorado dad killed in hammer-throw accident at high school track meet
item.description: Wade Langston, 57, was identified as the man killed in a weight-throwing accident, according to the El Paso County Coroner's Office.

item.title: Over 100 juveniles attend massive boozy house party at school principal's home: Cops
item.description: An elementary school principal has been arrested after throwing a massive boozy house party for over 100 juveniles, authorities said.
